title: Learning to TRULY love myself (Body Positivity + Acceptance)
itunes:title: Learning to TRULY love myself (Body Positivity + Acceptance)
description:
Solo episode with Brooke this week where she discusses tips on body acceptance based on her journey of getting confortable with her own body. She also answers some questions related to her realtionship with Danielle and the dating scene. 

Black-Owned Business of the Week:

https://kncbeauty.com/ 

Listen to Blood Ties Season 2 on the Wondery app. Download it today to join Wondery+ with a free trial to enjoy ad free listening, exclusives, binges and early access. Get it here: 

https://wondery.app.link/UpmaC6vYI7 

 Wondery’s hit audio drama “Blood Ties” is back for a second season with Josh Gad & Gillian Jacobs returning as Michael and Elenore Richland. This season they are joined by Dominic Monaghan (“Lost”) as David Hammer the new CEO of Richland Health and Wayne Knight as Peter Richland. 

 Season one was all about questions. What did Peter Richland do? How far will Richland Health go to bury the story? And when faced with the choice of telling the truth or losing billions what side would Michael and Elenore fall on. Season two is all about answers.
